Three users each breathe a long stream of intense fire, which combine to form a flaming dragon.

== Trivia ==
* The [[Wikipedia:Garuda|Garuda]] is a large mythical bird or bird-like creature that appears in both [[Wikipedia:Hinduism|Hindu]] and [[Wikipedia:Buddhism|Buddhist]] religion.
